医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
对念珠菌的认识取得突破一些家庭从婴儿期起，通常终生都会因一种称为念珠菌的先天性脱发而遭受断发之苦。波恩大学医院和波恩大学的研究人员现已发现另一种角蛋白基因 KRT31 的致病突变。他们希望这将改善这种罕见疾病的诊断。他们的研究结果现已发表在著名的《英国皮肤病学杂志》上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Breakthrough-in-understanding-monilethrix.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Breakthrough-in-understanding-monilethrix.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=47707d96-45cf-4c2b-a5c5-63fad6cda282 Thu, 05 Sep 2024 02:12:43 -0400 Breakthrough in understanding monilethrix
呼吁加强 H5N1 流感准备和应对随着 H5N1 流感的全球威胁迫在眉睫，包括美国在内的各个物种和各大洲都爆发了疫情，三名国际疫苗和公共卫生专家表示，现在是时候充分提供资源并支持一项强有力的战略来应对这一和未来潜在的大流行性流感威胁，包括考虑为那些目前处于暴露风险的人自愿接种疫苗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/A-call-for-robust-H5N1-influenza-preparedness-and-response.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/A-call-for-robust-H5N1-influenza-preparedness-and-response.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e64dca05-9e4d-421a-a260-4d476b7ce49e Thu, 05 Sep 2024 02:12:17 -0400 A call for robust H5N1 influenza preparedness and response
对僵人综合症的新见解，推进诊断和治疗研究探索了诊断和治疗僵人综合症的复杂性，强调了 GAD 抗体的不确定作用和新疗法的前景。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/New-insights-into-stiff-person-syndrome-advancing-diagnosis-and-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/New-insights-into-stiff-person-syndrome-advancing-diagnosis-and-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5ec4f60a-3daf-4da6-a20f-1da05ec1c6bb Thu, 05 Sep 2024 01:58:00 -0400 New insights into stiff-person syndrome, advancing diagnosis and treatment
识别有效心脏康复的障碍宣布在《心血管创新与应用》杂志上发表新文章。心脏康复（CR）通常包括体育活动和生活方式改变，包括戒烟、坚持健康饮食、压力管理、药物依从性管理、减少危险因素、心理社会支持和教育。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Identifying-barriers-to- effective-cardiac-rehabilitation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Identifying-barriers-to- effective-cardiac-rehabilitation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=747891ad-50f0-43c5-8c92-1dac48656976 Thu, 05 Sep 2024 01:27:41 -0400 Identifying barriers to effective cardiac rehabilitation
科学家利用尖端干细胞和基因编辑技术推进 1 型糖尿病治疗研究人员回顾了 1 型糖尿病细胞替代疗法的重大进展和持续挑战，重点介绍了干细胞衍生胰岛和免疫保护策略的创新方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Scientists-advance-type-1-diabetes-treatment-with-cutting-edge-stem-cell-and-gene-editing-technologies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Scientists-advance-type-1-diabetes-treatment-with-cutting-edge-stem-cell-and-gene-editing-technologies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=49516658-17c0-4e38-a030-c3d2c0ac0030 Thu, 05 Sep 2024 01:24:00 -0400 Scientists advance type 1 diabetes treatment with cutting-edge stem cell and gene editing technologies
用于早期检测阿尔茨海默病的血液生物标志物新的研究发现了一种独特且有前景的早期诊断阿尔茨海默氏病 (AD) 的方法——通过分析血液中的 AD 生物标志物——从而减少痴呆症的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Blood-based-biomarkers-for-early-detection-of-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Blood-based-biomarkers-for-early-detection-of-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aeb9851e-5c34-46a8-9881-302f978bd292 Thu, 05 Sep 2024 01:12:14 -0400 Blood-based biomarkers for early detection of Alzheimer's disease
ULEZ 对儿童健康和环境的积极影响最新研究表明，在引入超低排放区 (ULEZ) 后，伦敦市中心开车上学的十分之四的儿童转而使用更活跃的交通方式，例如步行、骑自行车或公共交通。在没有 ULEZ 的比较区域卢顿，只有十分之二的孩子在同一时期进行了这种转变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/The-positive-impact-of-ULEZ-on-childrens-health-and-environment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/The-positive-impact-of-ULEZ-on-childrens-health-and-environment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=226b7257-c56a-485d-b311-877d923ba23d Thu, 05 Sep 2024 01:10:32 -0400 The positive impact of ULEZ on children's health and environment
高精度 X 射线揭示颈部疼痛的机制学习新语言、发送电子邮件、参加虚拟课程或与世界另一端的亲人交谈只是通过触摸智能手机上的按钮即可完成的一些任务。不幸的是，现代设备的易用性和便利性也带来了令人痛苦的痛苦。久坐的工作性质以及长时间使用手持设备和电脑导致颈部疼痛急剧增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/High- precision-X-rays-uncover-the-mechanics-of-neck-pain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/High- precision-X-rays-uncover-the-mechanics-of-neck-pain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d7224372-9e0e-4f8c-81ca-1c95449101df Thu, 05 Sep 2024 01:02:38 -0400 High-precision X-rays uncover the mechanics of neck pain
索马鲁肽通过降低 COVID-19 大流行期间与感染相关的死亡来降低肥胖患者的死亡率索马鲁肽可显着降低非糖尿病肥胖患者的全因死亡率，特别是通过降低 COVID-19 大流行期间与感染相关的死亡人数。然而，由于潜在的竞争风险和独特的大流行情况，应谨慎解释该研究的结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Semaglutide-reduced-mortality-in-obese-病人-by-lowering-infection-lated-deaths-during-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Semaglutide-reduced-mortality-in-obese-病人-by-lowering-infection-lated-deaths-during-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b8bfced-83fe-47de-a670-8c6a85c122ca Thu, 05 Sep 2024 00:48:00 -0400 Semaglutide reduced mortality in obese patients by lowering infection-related deaths during COVID-19 pandemic
硒和锰水平显着影响哮喘患者的死亡风险研究表明，血液中硒和锰含量的低和高都与成人哮喘患者死亡率的增加有关，这凸显了维持这些金属的最佳水平的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Selenium-and-manganese-levels-significantly-impact-mortality-risk-in-asthma-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Selenium-and-manganese-levels-significantly-impact-mortality-risk-in-asthma-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=96c6c3c5-dbf3-463d-bf7f-2c5bb268ced4 Thu, 05 Sep 2024 00:23:00 -0400 Selenium and manganese levels significantly impact mortality risk in asthma patients
